word:
We must no longer remain upon the enchanted ground. We are fast approaching the close of our probation. Let every soul inquire, How do I stand before God? We know not how soon our names may be taken into the lips of Christ, and our cases be finally decided. What, oh, what 
                                                                           126
will these decisions be! Shall we be counted with the righteous, or shall we be numbered with the wicked?
